phrs.translation: 波动, 波荡, 球道
波动效应, 颠簸效应
表面波度, 表面起伏
大地水准面起伏, 大地水准面的起伏

sentences.sentence: So that's it, these are the 11 drills to learn the body undulation and dolphin kick!
sentences.translation: 原来如此，这些都是11演习，学习身体波动和海豚踢！

sentences.sentence: The dolphin kick and body undulation exercises simply teach you how to learn the technique described above.
sentences.translation: 海豚式打腿练习和身体的波动只是教你怎么学技术前述。

sentences.sentence: This is normal as there is less leverage to execute the body undulation when the arms are kept to the sides.
sentences.translation: 这是正常的，很少有杠杆执行时的身体波动武器被保持到两边。
